content:
Let's update the template with those estimates.

**Updated Travel Expenses Template:**

| Date | Trip Details | Flight Costs | Transportation Costs | Accommodation Costs | Food & Activities | Total |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Month | NYC to LAX (Trip 1) | $500 | $60 | $600 | $240-300 | $1400-1560 |
| Month | NYC to LAX (Trip 2) | $500 | $0 | $600 | $240-300 | $1340-1500 |
| Upcoming | NYC to CHI (Business Meeting) | ? | ? | ? | ? | ? |

Now that we have a better idea of your total costs for each trip, let's calculate the average cost per trip. This can help you plan and budget for future trips.

**Average Trip Cost:** ($1400-1560 + $1340-1500) / 2 = $1370-1530

This average cost range can serve as a rough estimate for your future trips. Of course, actual costs may vary depending on the destination, accommodations, and other factors.

How does this look? Is there anything else you'd like to track or add to the template?

Also, have you thought about setting a budget for your upcoming Chicago trip? With the flight costs and accommodation costs still unknown, we can try to estimate those expenses based on your past experiences.
